zock_lang.label: loginhome_paystake
zock_lang.cnt: Please pay to the organizer the stake for the event: $1. If you already have done so, notify it to him or her.

zock_lang.label: loginhome_reimbursement
zock_lang.cnt: You should get the winnings soon. Otherwise make pressure on the organizer :-)

zock_lang.label: loginhome_filloutbankdetails
zock_lang.cnt: Fill out your bank account details so you can get reimbursed.

zock_lang.label: loginhome_filloutname
zock_lang.cnt: Fill your out your name so the other users know you are.

zock_lang.label: loginhome_putpicture
zock_lang.cnt: Upload a picture to your profile. Otherwise it will be a pig

zock_lang.label: admin_content
zock_lang.cnt: From here you can manage your betting office: manipulate the settings, manage participants & betting games etc. Simply take a look at the menu.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_activatedialog
zock_lang.cnt: This step is irreversible. Do you really want to activate this betting game?

zock_lang.label: admin_events_activatefirst
zock_lang.cnt: This part ist only available if the betting game is activated.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_active
zock_lang.cnt: This betting game is active. The users are able to register to it.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_approved_message
zock_lang.cnt: Hello $1 You have been admitted to the betting game $2! Now you can place the bets.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_deadlineover
zock_lang.cnt: The deadline's over! Nevertheless, you can add a further user to this betting game:

zock_lang.label: admin_events_enoughadds
zock_lang.cnt: You cannot add more matches at once. Just save for now.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_howmanyemptymatches
zock_lang.cnt: How many empty matches would like to add?

zock_lang.label: admin_events_inactive
zock_lang.cnt: This betting game is inactive and thus not visible for the users. The fields "Deadline", "Currency", "Stake per match" and "Rounding precision" will not be editable anymore in case of activation.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_matches_content
zock_lang.cnt: Add matches or edit the existing ones. If you want to change the name of a team for the whole event, click on change competitor.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_nomatches
zock_lang.cnt: There are no matches for this event! Click on + Matches to add some. Please pay attention that you type in the kick-off time in the correct format.

zock_lang.label: admin_lang_editbelow
zock_lang.cnt: Edit an element of the list below.

zock_lang.label: admin_lang_listalluncompleted
zock_lang.cnt: list of all the uncompleted elements

zock_lang.label: admin_lang_listlanguncompleted
zock_lang.cnt: list of the uncompleted elements of your language

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_bank_account_text
zock_lang.cnt: By the following three fields you should indicate where the participants should transfer their stakes to.

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_bank_account_text2
zock_lang.cnt: ..the second field is for the account number (Post account number or IBAN)..

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_bank_account_text1
zock_lang.cnt: The first filed is for the account type (e.g. Post account or bank account)..

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_descriptiontext
zock_lang.cnt: A short description/slogan which will be displayed in the head of the site.

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_formlinestext
zock_lang.cnt: Defines how much lines are displayed in long forms. E.g. where you place bets.

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_lang
zock_lang.cnt: Choose a default language for the Website.

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_nametext
zock_lang.cnt: What should be the name of your bet office?

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_styletext
zock_lang.cnt: Choose a style for the website.

zock_lang.label: comments_participatefirst
zock_lang.cnt: Before you can write any comments, you should participate in an betting game.

zock_lang.label: error_commentsave
zock_lang.cnt: No comment could have been saved!

zock_lang.label: error_content
zock_lang.cnt: I want to go home!

zock_lang.label: error_doesnotparticipate
zock_lang.cnt: This user does not participate in this betting game!

zock_lang.label: error_filledform
zock_lang.cnt: The filled form contains errors (the red marked entries).

zock_lang.label: error_login
zock_lang.cnt: The login name or the password was wrong!

zock_lang.label: error_menu
zock_lang.cnt: This menu isn't available for you!

zock_lang.label: error_myprofile_password
zock_lang.cnt: An error occured! Try it once more!

zock_lang.label: error_names
zock_lang.cnt: You have to fill in your names.

zock_lang.label: error_notinevent
zock_lang.cnt: You haven't got the permission to get the information for the requested betting game.

zock_lang.label: error_register
zock_lang.cnt: You couldn't be registered for there was a conflict with the entries you made.

zock_lang.label: error_register_save
zock_lang.cnt: Error while saving! Try again to register yourself.

zock_lang.label: error_site
zock_lang.cnt: This site isn't available for you!

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_cup_phase
zock_lang.cnt: Possible match conclusion in the cup phase: only

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_deadline_day_before
zock_lang.cnt: The bet has to entered online by no later than 1 to midnight the day before the match takes place. As soon as the day of the match has begun (00:00) it is not possible anymore to place a bet!

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_deadline_toolate
zock_lang.cnt: If you're too late: Just our luck, there's nothing to changeable about it.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_finalaccount_gainplusjp
zock_lang.cnt: The total win sum at the end consists of the money won during the betting game and the jackpot share. The winner is the person which won the greatest amount of money.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_gain_nobodycorrect
zock_lang.cnt: If the correct end score hasn't been betted,

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_points_correct
zock_lang.cnt: a correct bet is worth $1 point(s)

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_points_almost
zock_lang.cnt: a correct match conclusion ($1 3-2 instead of 4-1) is worth $2 point(s)

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_gain_correcttip
zock_lang.cnt: If the correct end score has been betted on, will the concerning participant get all the stakes betted for this match (that means: #participants * $1)

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_gain_correcttips
zock_lang.cnt: If multiple participants have bet on the correct score, the stakes betted for this match will bi splitted up between them as good as possible. A possible leftover goes into the Jackpot.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_group_phase
zock_lang.cnt: Possible match conclusions in the group phase:

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_jackpot
zock_lang.cnt: The distribution of the jackpot fully dependant of the points. The more points one has, the greater the jackpot share.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_jackpot_distributeon
zock_lang.cnt: The distribution happens on the first $1 of the ranking.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_jackpot_linformula
zock_lang.cnt: The distribution will happen in a exponential manner. The formula will be: "Share(Rank) = (Jackpot / Σ(Sharer Ranks)) * (Sharers - (Rank – 1))".

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_jackpot_expformula
zock_lang.cnt: The distribution will happen in a exponential manner. The formula will be: "Share(Rank) = (1-k)^(Rank-1) * k * Jackpot" . A little rest will be left over (logically). To distribute the rest, the same formula will be applicated until there's no leftover anymore. k is for this betting game $1. Thus, the first ranked will get a smidgeon more than $2 of the jackpot.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_jackpot_samerank
zock_lang.cnt: If multiple participants have the same amount of points, the jackpot shares of the concerning ranks will be added up and the money equally distributed on the participants in question.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_overview
zock_lang.cnt: To be sure that nobody is able to cheat, the bets of all the participants are visible to the others and the accounts are password-protected.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_penalty_decision
zock_lang.cnt: If a match is settled by penalty shoot-out, the winner team gets an extra goal added to the match score.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_points
zock_lang.cnt: During the betting game, points are distributed to the participants:

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_precise_tip
zock_lang.cnt: For every match, an exact score is betted:

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_rules
zock_lang.cnt: How the betting game works is explained in the following points:

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_sealofapproval
zock_lang.cnt: not to forget: $1's thoroughly well desgnied seal of approval:

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_stakepermatch
zock_lang.cnt: The stake for every match (every single bet) is $1.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_staketotal
zock_lang.cnt: There are $1 matches taking place. This means that the whole bet sum is an amount of $2! This amount is to be wired before the first bet can be placed.

zock_lang.label: general_langchange
zock_lang.cnt: Do you want to change the language?

zock_lang.label: general_nomatches
zock_lang.cnt: Yet, there are no played matches for this betting game.

zock_lang.label: general_redirect
zock_lang.cnt: You are going to be redirected immediatly.

zock_lang.label: home_content
zock_lang.cnt:
This site gives you the possibility to bet on sport events.
For you can participate, you have to register yourself by following this link: register.

If you already have an account, you can log yourself in

zock_lang.label: home_events
zock_lang.cnt: Currently, there are following active betting games:

zock_lang.label: home_noevents
zock_lang.cnt: Yet, there aren't any public betting games active.

zock_lang.label: login_content
zock_lang.cnt: Fill in the neccessary information in order to log in:

zock_lang.label: loginhome_noevent
zock_lang.cnt: So far, you're not participating in any betting game. You can go announce yourself to an event in your profile as well as adjust other settings. Besides that, there's not so much you can do for now.

zock_lang.label: loginhome_yourevent
zock_lang.cnt: You participate in following betting game:

zock_lang.label: loginhome_yourevents
zock_lang.cnt: You participate in following betting games:

zock_lang.label: logout_content
zock_lang.cnt: You're now logged out and you're going to be redirected now.

zock_lang.label: myprofile_content
zock_lang.cnt: In this area you can determine your appearance to the others and the appearance of the betting office to you. Furthermore you can change your password. <p/> For all the changes you'd like to effect, use the submenus.

zock_lang.label: myprofile_password_content
zock_lang.cnt: Enter one time the old and two times the desired password to change it.

zock_lang.label: myprofile_settings_changeemail
zock_lang.cnt: To change the eMail you have to enter it two times.

zock_lang.label: myprofile_settings_content
zock_lang.cnt:
Here, you can register yourself to betting games, besides other things.
An "open" betting game is open to you to participate, a "waiting" betting game means, that you have to wait for the admission by an admin, "approved" & "denied" betting games are those betting games where you're definitively participating, or definitevely not participating, respectively.

After changing anzthing (z.b. clicking on participate) you have to click on "save changes" below

zock_lang.label: myprofile_settings_email_notify
zock_lang.cnt: If you have done that, you can write an email to $1 to inform the admin(s)

zock_lang.label: myprofile_settings_eventinfo
zock_lang.cnt: This event has $1 matches on which $2 are bet per match. Therefore one has to bet a total of $3 to be allowed to take part on this betting game. To order to be admitted, the just mentioned sum should be wired to the organisator of this betting game.

zock_lang.label: myprofile_settings_wiringcomment
zock_lang.cnt:
As wiring comment, you sould write:
$1: $2 participates!

zock_lang.label: mytips_participatefirst
zock_lang.cnt: You should participate on an betting game before you can place any bets. Go participate or, if already done, wait until your approved by the administrator.

zock_lang.label: overview_content
zock_lang.cnt:
The overview serves you to get all the important information you need about a betting game What do the others bet on? Who is the leader?
The summaries display collected Money & Points of the particular user.
For you can see as much information as possible you can minimize the menu to the right.

zock_lang.label: overview_noevents
zock_lang.cnt: Unfortunately, there are no betting games to to overview so far!

zock_lang.label: participants_content
zock_lang.cnt: Find out who with whom you are playing.

zock_lang.label: participants_noevents
zock_lang.cnt: Yet there are no events where one could already participate.

zock_lang.label: participants_nousers
zock_lang.cnt: This betting game hasn't got any participants yet.

zock_lang.label: register_content
zock_lang.cnt: To be able to register to a betting game you have to create a user profile first, with wich you can log you on. Not until then you can participate in an event.

zock_lang.label: register_ok
zock_lang.cnt: You've been registered successfully. An eMail with a password in it has been sent to you. Quite ofthen tough, it is hold back by the spam filter - therefore here's the eMail:

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_gain_tojackpot
zock_lang.cnt: all the stakes betted for this match move in the jackpot.

zock_lang.label: ranking_waitfortips
zock_lang.cnt: The next tips are not public yet.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_pointdistr_diff
zock_lang.cnt: Correctly betted goal difference for the correct team (e.g. 3-2 instead of 2-1)

zock_lang.label: admin_events_pointdistr_almost
zock_lang.cnt: Correctly bettet game concluseion (like toto) for the correct team (e.g. 1-0 instead of 4-1)

zock_lang.label: myprofile_settings_bank_account_intro
zock_lang.cnt: Indicate where the gain should be wired to after the betting game:

zock_lang.label: myprofile_settings_participatereally
zock_lang.cnt: Do you really want to particiapte in this betting game?

zock_lang.label: myprofile_settings_withdrawreally
zock_lang.cnt: Do you really not want to participate?

zock_lang.label: admin_messages_newmessage
zock_lang.cnt: This is a new message by $1, sent $2 $3:

zock_lang.label: myprofile_settings_preferredlanguage
zock_lang.cnt: Choose your preferred language for the website

zock_lang.label: admin_events_jackpotexp
zock_lang.cnt: Distribute the jackpot on a fraction of the participants (in %) or on a fix number of participants.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_jackpot_fraction
zock_lang.cnt: Type in the fraction in Percent (e.g. 33% for the first third)

zock_lang.label: admin_events_jackpot_fix
zock_lang.cnt: Type in until what rank the jackpot is going to be distributed.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_firstjackpotfixfield
zock_lang.cnt: You first have to define the amount of sharers!

zock_lang.label: admin_events_fixshares
zock_lang.cnt: This feld indicates the fix share of the Jackpot (click on $1 or in the field in order to make changes).

zock_lang.label: admin_events_expshares
zock_lang.cnt: Fill in a coefficient (inferior to 0) for the exponential distribution. The first ranked will get about this share of the jackpot (coefficient * jackpot).

zock_lang.label: admin_events_betonexp
zock_lang.cnt:
You can bet on either
-Score of the match: 3-2, 1-3, 0-0
-Toto of the match: 1 = Home team wins, 2 = Away team wins, x = tie

zock_lang.label: admin_events_komatchesexp
zock_lang.cnt: Are there knockout-matches in this betting game? In such matches, there has to be a winner, the loser is out and no tie is possible.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_afterpenalty
zock_lang.cnt:
How will be the result after a possible penalty shootout?
- add all the penalties to the result
- add one goal to the winner team score

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_gain_stakeback
zock_lang.cnt: those who guessed the correct match conclusion ($1/$2/$3) nevertheless get their stake for this bet ($4) back. The rest of the stakes moves into the Jackpot.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_nostake
zock_lang.cnt: There is no stake for this betting game, meaning that you don't have to pay anything in order to participate.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_fixstake
zock_lang.cnt: The stake for this betting game is a fix amount about $1.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_beton_toto
zock_lang.cnt: In this betting game, you will bet on toto (possible match conclusions). That means one has theoreticall the three possibilities: $1$2$3.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_matches_both_types
zock_lang.cnt: There are $1 as well as $2 in this betting game.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_tietough
zock_lang.cnt: The score considered$1, si the one at the end of the Match (without penalty shootout).

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_afterpenalties
zock_lang.cnt: If a match is decided by a penalty shootout,

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_afterpenalties_one
zock_lang.cnt: one goal will be added to the score of the winner team.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_afterpenalties_all
zock_lang.cnt: all penalty goals will be added to the score.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_bet_until
zock_lang.cnt: The bets have to be placed until $1 before $2.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_points_diff
zock_lang.cnt: a correctly betted goal difference ($1 0-3 instead of 1-4) is worth $2 point(s)

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_points_wrong
zock_lang.cnt: an absolutely wrong bet is worth $3 point(s)

zock_lang.label: login_userdatamail
zock_lang.cnt:
You asked for your user data for the $1. A new password, which you can alter easily, was automatically generated.
$2
$3
-----------------------------
$4

zock_lang.label: login_userdatasent
zock_lang.cnt: Your user data was sent to $1

zock_lang.label: error_nouserwiththisemail
zock_lang.cnt: There is no user account with this eMail address

zock_lang.label: error_nofunctionalsmtp
zock_lang.cnt: Sorry, but it's not possible to send eMails from this server.

zock_lang.label: general_writetoadmin
zock_lang.cnt: Please write an eMail about your problem to the administrator. You will find the address in the footer of this site.

zock_lang.label: error_register_alreadyaccount
zock_lang.cnt: There already is an user account with this very eMail!

zock_lang.label: error_register_logintoolong
zock_lang.cnt: The username's length must not be longer than 15 characters

zock_lang.label: login_askfordata
zock_lang.cnt: Here you can ask for your user data by indicating your eMail address

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_siteurltext
zock_lang.cnt: Indicate the URL to access this website.

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_notificationstext
zock_lang.cnt: Choose in what cases and how you want to be notified.

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_notify_participate
zock_lang.cnt: Upon a participation on a betting game

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_notify_newaccount
zock_lang.cnt: Upon a creation of a new user account

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_notify_withdraw
zock_lang.cnt: Upon a withdrawal from a betting game

zock_lang.label: register_emailhere
zock_lang.cnt: Thus, the eMail is displayed here:

zock_lang.label: register_newaccounttext
zock_lang.cnt: A new user account has been created.

zock_lang.label: myprofile_settings_notifyparticipatetxt
zock_lang.cnt: $1 wants to participate in the betting game $2.

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_smtpactivated
zock_lang.cnt: The sending of emails by SMTP is activated!

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_smtpexp
zock_lang.cnt: In order to be able to send emails you need an SMTP-access. Either there is one at your service on this very server or you make use of an SMTP-access on another Server (f.ex. your private email address).

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_fromaddressexp
zock_lang.cnt: The sender address does not necessarily have to correspond with the address of the SMTP-access. Altough, a few server only accept "alien" sender addresses if they have been confirmed before.

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_smtpportexp
zock_lang.cnt: Is only in rare cases not 465

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_smtpdisactivated
zock_lang.cnt: The sending of emails by SMTP is disactivated! It is not possible to send emails from this website.

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_mailnotsent
zock_lang.cnt: The test email could not be sent with these parameters! The sending of emails is now deactivated!

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_mailsent
zock_lang.cnt: A test email has been sent successfully to $1! Sending emails is now activated.

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_testemail_subject
zock_lang.cnt: Successfully activated email sending by SMTP!

zock_lang.label: admin_settings_testemail_txt
zock_lang.cnt:
From now on you can let yourself be notified or send a note to other users by email from the website. Furthermore, the registration is better now, since an email with the password is sent to a new user!

Meh Informatione zu SMTP:

  • Wikipedia
  • Google Support

zock_lang.label: error_filter_emptyresults
zock_lang.cnt: No entry corresponds to this filter.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_stakeback
zock_lang.cnt: In case that nobody betted the correct score, should the match stake be returned at least to those who anticipated a correct final match state? If you choose no, the whole stake for the match goes into the jackpot.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_stakebacknotpossible
zock_lang.cnt: It is only possible to return the stake for the match if the bet is placed on an exact score!

zock_lang.label: admin_events_betuntilexp
zock_lang.cnt:
Until when should the bets be placed?
Either a fix amount of minutes or days before the game or the start of the betting game.
Choosing minutes, the time is exactly measured as indicated, but choosing days, ONLY the date is important. 1 day before = the day before
Before the start of the betting game means, that ALL the bets have to be placed before the first match.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_nextstepdialog
zock_lang.cnt: ONLY if you are really sure, that everything is set as you wish, go to

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_finalaccount_jp
zock_lang.cnt: The total win sum is the share on the jackot. The player with the most points receives the greatest share and is thus the winner.

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_jackpot_fixformula
zock_lang.cnt: The fix distribution will happen in the following way:

zock_lang.label: admin_events_err_invalid_jackpotfix
zock_lang.cnt: Invalid rank for fix jackpot distribution!

zock_lang.label: admin_events_err_invalid_jackpotfixshares
zock_lang.cnt: The amount of ranks does not correspond to the fix jackpot shares.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_err_invalid_expshare
zock_lang.cnt: Invalid coefficient for the exponential distribution!

zock_lang.label: admin_events_err_invalid_betuntil
zock_lang.cnt: Invalid entry for the betting deadline!

zock_lang.label: admin_events_err_invalid_pcorrect
zock_lang.cnt: Invalid point amount for correct bets!

zock_lang.label: admin_events_err_invalid_pdiff
zock_lang.cnt: Invalid point amount for score difference bets!

zock_lang.label: admin_events_err_invalid_palmost
zock_lang.cnt: Invalid point amount for final match state bets!

zock_lang.label: admin_events_err_invalid_pwrong
zock_lang.cnt: Invalid point amount for wrong bets!

zock_lang.label: admin_events_fromphase3
zock_lang.cnt: This part is only available from phase 3 on.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_phase3text
zock_lang.cnt: Now you have the possibility to adjust the schedule, as long the betting game not visible. Everything except "$2" you can adjust now, you can also adjust after the activation, but only activate if you really want that it should be visible to the users!

zock_lang.label: admin_events_inputtypeexp
zock_lang.cnt: How would you enter the score after the game?

zock_lang.label: error_incorrectmatchnb
zock_lang.cnt: The amount of matches in the schedule is not equal to the amount of matches set for this betting game.

zock_lang.label: admin_events_existantmatchesremoved
zock_lang.cnt: The already existing matches will be deleted!

zock_lang.label: eventinfo_finalaccount_points
zock_lang.cnt: The winner is the one with the most points.
